infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: VIS Eyesight needs camera access to capture inspection photos and AR overlays with Spectacles.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: VIS Eyesight needs microphone access for voice-controlled defect marking.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: VIS Eyesight needs photo library access to save inspection documentation.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: VIS Eyesight needs location access to tag jobsite projects with GPS coordinates.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: VIS Eyesight uses speech recognition for hands-free voice commands on jobsites.
